com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class ColumnLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.ColumnLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class ColumnLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    ColumnLayout renders its items in columns.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ColumnLayout.Alignment
      An enumeration of possible values for horizontal alignment of column content.

      Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units.

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
                    ColumnLayout.Alignment[] columnAlignments)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths and column alignments.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units.
        columnAlignments - the column alignments

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
                    int hgap,
                    int vgap)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units.
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the columns, measured in pixels.
        vgap - the vertical gap between the rows, measured in pixels.

      • ColumnLayout

        public ColumnLayout(int[] columnWidths,
                    ColumnLayout.Alignment[] columnAlignments,
                    int hgap,
                    int vgap)
        Creates a ColumnLayout with the specified percentage column widths.
        Parameters:
        columnWidths - the column widths, in percent units.
        columnAlignments - the column alignments
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the columns, measured in pixels.
        vgap - the vertical gap between the rows, measured in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(int col,
                         ColumnLayout.Alignment alignment)
        Sets the alignment of the given column. An IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown if col is out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        col - the index of the column to set the alignment of.
        alignment - the alignment to set.

      • getHgap

        public int getHgap()
        Returns:
        Returns the horizontal gap between the cells, measured in pixels.

      • getVgap

        public int getVgap()
        Returns:
        Returns the vertical gap between the cells, measured in pixels.

      • getColumnWidth

        public int getColumnWidth(int columnIndex)
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - the index of the column to retrieve the width for.
        Returns:
        the width of the given column.

      • getColumnAlignment

        public ColumnLayout.Alignment getColumnAlignment(int columnIndex)
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - the index of the column to retrieve the alignment for.
        Returns:
        the alignment of the given column.

      • getColumnCount

        public int getColumnCount()
        Returns:
        the number of columns in this layout.
